root.name: Robotics;Notes
root.description: OverviewRobotics;Notes is the third game in the Science Adventure series of visual novels. It was released for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in Japan on June 28, 2012.The game takes place in 2019, and its worldline is signified by the Divergence Ratio 1.048596, making it an alternate future of the Steins;Gate universe. Some characters from Steins;Gate make an appearance or are mentioned in Robotics;Notes.
